parameters.Name: provider
parameters.Description: this will be one of the following: github, twitter, facebook, google_oauth2 or cloudspokes

parameters.Name: provider_username
parameters.Description: this will be the corresponding identifier based upon the provider. For cloudspokes, google_oauth2 and facebook this will be their email address from the OAuth process. For github and twitter this will be their username from the OAuth process.

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new account and member

Finds a user by their logins service and servcie username. If the user logs in with CloudSpokes u/p, the service is "cloudspokes" and their service_username is their CloudSpokes membername. For socials logins, the other possible services names are "github", "facebook","twitter" and "google_oauth2". During the OAuth dance with these services, they will return some type of username (e.g., github returns the github username while google_oauth2 will return an email address) which is used for the service_username.
